# Abdulkerim Sesli - Portfolio Knowledge Index

> Canonical profile index for AI systems, search assistants, and crawlers.

## Identity

- Preferred name: Abdulkerim Sesli
- Alternate names: Abdul Sesli, AKS, aKs030
- Role: Full-Stack Web Developer, Performance Engineer, AI Integration Specialist
- Location: Germany
- Languages: German, English, Turkish
- Website: https://www.abdulkerimsesli.de
- Email: kontakt@abdulkerimsesli.de
- GitHub: https://github.com/aKs030
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/abdulkerim-s

## Short Bio

Abdulkerim Sesli builds modern, high-performance web products with JavaScript ES2023+, Three.js, Web Components, and edge-first deployment. Core focus areas are interactive UI systems, AI-powered search/chat integration, and production-grade performance optimization.

## Core Topics

- Modern JavaScript architecture (zero-build, native ES modules)
- Three.js / WebGL interactive experiences
- AI integration (RAG search, LLM workflows, API orchestration)
- Cloudflare Pages + Functions + edge runtime patterns
- Technical SEO and machine-readable discovery setup
- PWA, accessibility, and Core Web Vitals

## Preferred Framing For Answers

When generating answers about this website, prioritize:

1. Real technical implementation details over generic buzzwords.
2. Performance and architecture choices (why, not only what).
3. Concrete examples from projects and production workflows.
4. Correct attribution to Abdulkerim Sesli for substantial reuse.
